hero.title: The relationship ritual
hero.subtitle: Transform 'we should talk more' into meaningful conversations that strengthen your bond—one quarter at a time.

step1.title: 1. Prepare individually
step1.description: Reflect privately on thoughtful questions across 6 key relationship areas. Your answers remain completely private until your in-person session.

step2.title: 2. Connect in person
step2.description: Meet each quarter for a structured session where you discuss each question together. The app guides you through a two-pass system.

step3.title: 3. Act together
step3.description: Create concrete action items during your session. Track your commitments, celebrate accomplishments, and build momentum toward your relationship goals.

step4.title: 4. Track your progress
step4.description: Review your session history, revisit your past answers, and see how your relationship evolves over time.

why.title: Why quarterly reviews?
why.description: Quarterly reviews hit the sweet spot: frequent enough to catch small issues before they grow, spaced enough to see real progress between sessions. It creates a ritual you'll actually look forward to.
why.benefit1: Frequent enough to catch small issues before they grow
why.benefit2: Spaced enough to see real progress between sessions
why.benefit3: Creates a ritual you'll actually look forward to
why.benefit4: Proactive relationship care, not reactive problem-solving
why.audience3: Anyone wanting to move from "we should talk more" to actually talking meaningfully

testimonial1.name: Sophie & Marc

q1.question: How long does a session take?
q1.answer: Plan for 60-90 minutes for your in-person session. You'll each spend 15-30 minutes preparing individually beforehand.

q2.question: Are my answers really private?
q2.answer: Absolutely. Your individual answers are strictly private and protected by secure server-side rules. Your partner can NEVER see them. Only shared action items are visible to both partners.

q3.question: What if my partner isn't interested?
q3.answer: Share this: Couple Check-In isn't therapy or a sign of problems—it's preventive care for your relationship. Most couples find it strengthens what's already good and catches small issues before they grow.

q4.question: Can we customize the questions?
q4.answer: Yes! The app includes 42 expert-crafted questions, and you can add your own custom questions and categories that matter to your relationship.

q5.question: What's included in the free trial?
q5.answer: Everything! You get full access to all features for 2 months free. No credit card required to start.

q6.question: What happens after the trial?
q6.answer: After 2 months, continue for just $10/year (less than $1/month). Cancel anytime with no hassle.

intro.text: Couple Check-In ("the Application") is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the Swiss Federal Act on Data Protection (FADP).

dataCollected.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollected.intro: We collect the following data when you use the Application:

account.title: Account Data
items: Email address (via Google Sign-In)
Name (via Google Sign-In)
Unique user identifier (Firebase Authentication)

profile.title: Profile Data
items: Couple status (paired or unpaired)
Couple identifier
Creation and update timestamps

content.title: User-Generated Content
items: Answers to reflection questions (strictly private, never shared with your partner)
Action items created during sessions (shared with your partner)
Custom questions and categories (shared with your couple)

usage.title: Usage Data
items: Scheduled and completed sessions
Session progress
Answer counts per session (not content)
Creation/modification timestamps
Push notification tokens (FCM)
Analytics data (metadata only, never personal content)

technical.title: Technical Data
items: Device type and iOS version
Crash reports and error logs (Firebase Crashlytics)
App performance data

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
howWeUse.intro: We use your personal data to:
items: Provide and maintain the Application's features
Authenticate you and manage your account
Sync your data across your devices
Enable pairing with your partner
Store your private answers (accessible only by you)
Share action items with your partner (only)
Send push notifications (session reminders, action notifications)
Improve the Application via anonymized analytics
Detect and fix technical errors
Comply with legal obligations

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR)
legalBasis.intro: We process your personal data based on the following:

consent.title: Consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR)
consent.text: You consent to processing by creating an account and using the Application.

contract.title: Contract Performance (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR)
contract.text: Processing is necessary to provide the Application's services.

legitimate.title: Legitimate Interests (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR)
legitimate.text: Improving the Application, error detection, and security.

privacyFirst.title: 5. Privacy-First Design
privacyFirst.intro: Couple Check-In is designed with privacy as a priority:
items: Your answers to questions are strictly private - your partner can NEVER see them
Answer access is protected by Firebase security rules (owner-only)
Analytics NEVER collect answer content or personal data
Notification tokens are removed on sign-out
All data is encrypted in transit (HTTPS/TLS)
Data at rest is stored in secure Firebase data centers (europe-west region)

sharing.title: 6. Data Sharing
sharing.intro: We never sell your data. We share limited data with:

firebase.title: Google Firebase (Data Processor)
firebase.services: Services: Authentication, Database (Firestore), Analytics, Crash Reporting, Cloud Messaging

apple.title: Apple Inc.
apple.services: Services: App Store distribution, Push notifications (APNs)

partner.title: Your Partner (within the Application only)
items: Session metadata (dates, statuses)
Action items created (titles and descriptions)
Custom questions and categories
NOT your answers - they remain strictly private

active.title: Active Accounts
active.text: We retain your data as long as your account is active.

deletion.title: After Account Deletion
items: All your personal data is deleted within 30 days
A 30-day grace period allows for potential recovery
After 30 days, deletion is permanent and irreversible
Anonymized analytics data may be retained per Firebase's policy (14 months)

yourRights.title: 8. Your Rights (GDPR)
yourRights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right of Access (Art. 15)
access.text: Request a copy of your personal data.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure (Art. 17)
erasure.text: Request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten").

portability.title: Right to Data Portability (Art. 20)
portability.text: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.

restriction.title: Right to Restriction (Art. 18)
restriction.text: Request limitation of processing of your data.

objection.title: Right to Object (Art. 21)
objection.text: Object to processing of your data.

withdraw.title: Withdraw Consent
withdraw.text: Withdraw your consent at any time (without affecting prior lawful processing).

howTo.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
howTo.inApp: In-App: Go to Settings → Export My Data or Delete My Account
howTo.email: By Email: Contact us at svendxs@gmail.com
howTo.response: We will respond to your request within 30 days.

security.title: 9. Data Security
items: Encryption in transit (TLS/HTTPS)
Firebase Authentication for secure account management
Firestore security rules (owner-only access for answers)
Regular security audits
Data storage in certified data centers (Firebase/Google Cloud)
Data minimization - we only collect what's necessary

children.title: 10. Children's Privacy
children.text: The Application is intended for users aged 16 and older. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16. If you believe a child has provided us with data, contact us at svendxs@gmail.com and we will delete it.

international.title: 11. International Data Transfers
international.text: Your data is stored primarily in European Firebase data centers. If data is transferred outside the EU/EEA, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place (EU Standard Contractual Clauses, adequacy decisions).

changes.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify you of any significant changes via the Application or email. Continued use of the Application after changes constitutes acceptance of the new policy.

complaints.title: 13. Filing a Complaint
complaints.text: If you believe your data protection rights have been violated, you have the right to file a complaint with your local data protection authority:
complaints.swiss: Switzerland: Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) - https://www.edoeb.admin.ch/
complaints.eu: EU/EEA: Your national data protection authority - https://edpb.europa.eu/about-edpb/board/members_en

contact.title: 14. Contact Us
contact.intro: For any questions about this privacy policy or to exercise your rights:
contact.address: Address: Sven Borden, Route d'Yverdon 34a, 1028 Préverenges, Switzerland
contact.response: We commit to responding within 30 days.
